text:
pRuqthiqvyai svAhAq &ntari#kShAyaq svAhA# diqvE svAhAq sUryA#yaq svAhA# caqndrama#sEq svAhAq nakSha#trEByaqH svAhAq prAcyai# diqSE svAhAq dakShi#NAyai diqSE svAhA$ praqtIcyai# diqSE svAhO-dI$cyai diqSE svAhOqd^^rdhvAyai# diqSE svAhA# diqgByaH svAhA# &vAntaradiqSAByaqH svAhAq samA$ByaqH svAhA# SaqradByaqH svAhA# &hOrAqtrEByaqH svAhA$ &d^^rdhamAqsEByaqH svAhAq mAsE$ByaqH svAhAqrtuByaqH svAhA# saM~MvathsaqrAyaq svAhAq sarva#smaiq svAhA$ || 44
(pRuqthiqvyai sUryA#yaq nakSha#trEByaqH prAcyai# saqptaca#tvAri(gm)Sat) (A15)
